snippet: In an ad campaign, the network is trying to enlist the help of cable subscribers to push a fee deal through for stations in New York, Los Angeles and Dallas.
lead_paragraph: In an ad campaign, the network is trying to enlist the help of cable subscribers to push a fee deal through for stations in New York, Los Angeles and Dallas.

headline.main: CBS in Contract Showdown With Time Warner Cable
headline.print_headline: CBS in Contract Showdown With Time Warner Cable
